physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Maximum triglyceride level for male twin: 56.5 mmol/L (5000 mg/dL); female twin: 81.4 mmol/L (7200 mg/dL); older brother: 67.8 mmol/L (6000 mg/dL). Minimum triglyceride level for male twin: 8.7 mmol/L (774 mg/dL); female twin: 7.9 mmol/L (700 mg/dL); older brother: 3.6 mmol/L (321 mg/dL). Minimum apoB level <0.40 g/L for all siblings.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Implementation of a fat-restricted diet stabilized the siblings' triglyceride levels and curtailed pancreatitis episodes.
